mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_challenge ( challenge_title, challenge_content, recruitment_num, start_date, end_date, host_user, xp, thumbnail_url, challenge_category_code, challenge_status ) VALUES ( #{challengeTitle}, #{challengeContent}, #{recruitmentNum}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, CAST(#{hostUser} AS uuid), #{xp}, #{thumbnailUrl}, #{challengeCategoryCode}, #{challengeStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT challenge_code, created_at, challenge_title, challenge_content, host_user, recruitment_num, start_date, end_date, xp, thumbnail_url, challenge_category_code, challenge_status FROM tbl_challenge WHERE challenge_code = #{challengeCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_challenge_part ( challenge_code, user_code, is_host ) VALUES ( #{challengeCode}, CAST(#{userCode} AS uuid), #{isHost} )
mapper.select:
SELECT challenge_code as challengeCode, user_code as userCode
FROM tbl_challenge_part WHERE challenge_code = #{challengeCode} AND user_code = #{userCode}::uuid
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_challenge_part WHERE challenge_code = #{challengeCode} AND user_code = #{userCode}::uuid
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_challenge SET challenge_title = #{updateDTO.challengeTitle}, challenge_content = #{updateDTO.challengeContent}, recruitment_num = #{updateDTO.recruitmentNum}, start_date = #{updateDTO.startDate}, end_date = #{updateDTO.endDate}, xp = #{updateDTO.xp}, thumbnail_url = #{updateDTO.thumbnailUrl}, challenge_category_code = #{updateDTO.challengeCategoryCode}, challenge_status = #{updateDTO.challengeStatus} WHERE challenge_code = #{challengeCode} AND challenge_status NOT IN ('CANCELLED', 'CLOSED', 'PAUSED')
